channel.title: 317 Delta If you go into portal equip an item and you cant unequip in boundaries

item.title: 317 Delta If you go into portal equip an item and you cant unequip in boundaries
item.dc:creator: @fmcb fmcb
item.description:
@fmcb wrote:

Hey, I need to know when you go into portal

[code] if (objectID == 2472 && objectX == 2788 && objectY == 2977) {
triggerTele(2781, 2918, 0);
sM(“Welcome to the Waiting area.”);
sM(“This is a dangerous minigame.”);
sM(“Use ::islanddefense or ::home if your not ready.”);
}

                    if (objectID == 2471 && objectX == 2788 && objectY == 2981) {
      triggerTele(2777, 2916, 0);
    sM("Welcome to the Waiting area.");
    sM("This is a dangerous minigame.");
    sM("Use ::islanddefense or ::home if your not ready.");
   }[/code]

To make it equip 2414 (For the first one) and 2412 (For the second one)

And also how to make it so you can’t unequip them if your in boundaries of (x,y) 2800,3000 too 2700,2900

And what would the boolean be I have to search for?

-Fmcb

Read full topic
